text: Iochroma lehmannii is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador, specifically in the Chimborazo Province in the High Andes. Its flowers are yellow-green Page Iochroma lehmannii http://www.tropicos.org/Name/29605135?tab=images. ==References== lehmannii Category:Flora of Ecuador Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Iochroma lehmannii
